content: keep baby comfortable with this adorable knit hat they can wear with almost anything stitched in lightweight bernat baby jacquards it s designed to keep toddlers looking stylish while providing some shade from the sun the pattern is easy to stitch in rounds from the top down as you practice knit yarn over and increases techniques the brim is playfully styled with a rich ruffle to perfectly frame your child s face the pattern is offered in 6 - 24 month sizes yarn for model bernat® softee baby jacquards® 4 2 oz/120 g 287 yds/262 m faded blooms 52002 1 ball for each size
